channel.title: Help installing with Debian
channel.description: Hi all. I want to use whonix and I got on the trail of installing kicksecure on top of devian and onto a usb. I was able to get devian installed onto a usb but I cant figure out how to add kicksecure now. There seems to be only vague information online or maybe I just dont understand whats there. I have pretty bad ADD and sometimes its hard for me to understand written information so any help, links to guides would be greatly appreciated! If someone was willing to walk me through it I’d be happy to kick them a few bucks. I usually learn best by watching. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Help installing with Debian
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Debian:

Kicksecure – 11 Jul 22

Install Kicksecure ™ inside Debian

Kicksecure ™ can be installed on top of an existing Debian installation.

blueracecar:

devian

Unsupported at time of writing.

Kicksecure – 1 Dec 21

Undocumented, Untested or Unsupported Features

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become a Contributor / Apply Free Support Principle / Purchase Professional Support.

item.title: Help installing with Debian
item.dc:creator: blueracecar
item.description:
Hi all. I want to use whonix and I got on the trail of installing kicksecure on top of devian and onto a usb. I was able to get devian installed onto a usb but I cant figure out how to add kicksecure now. There seems to be only vague information online or maybe I just dont understand whats there. I have pretty bad ADD and sometimes its hard for me to understand written information so any help, links to guides would be greatly appreciated! If someone was willing to walk me through it I’d be happy to kick them a few bucks. I usually learn best by watching. Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
